bun run setup-wasm

ThemeColors:docs/implementation-plan.md:.name: ThemeColors
ThemeColors:docs/implementation-plan.md:.signature:
// Primary UI colors
	primary: string; // Main accent color
	secondary: string; // Secondary accent color

	// Text colors
	text: string; // Regular text
	dimText: string; // Secondary, less important text
	highlightText: string; // Important text

	// Background colors
	background: string; // Main background
	panel: string; // Panel/card background

	// State colors
	success: string; // Success states
	error: string; // Error states
	warning: string; // Warning states
	info: string; // Info states

	// UI element colors
	border: string; // Borders
	selection: string; // Selected items

Authors:docs/project-vision.md:5.name: Authors
Authors:docs/project-vision.md:5.content: **Authors:** Our GuardianAI Development Team (You and your AI Collaborator, Gemini)
Authors:docs/project-vision.md:5.signature: Our GuardianAI Development Team (You and your AI Collaborator, Gemini)

Vision:docs/project-vision.md:28.name: Vision
Vision:docs/project-vision.md:28.content: **Vision:** To create an AI-powered development environment where software is built and evolved with exceptional quality, perfect integration, and deep respect for the unique character of each codebase, fostering a true human-AI partnership in the art of software creation.
Vision:docs/project-vision.md:28.signature: To create an AI-powered development environment where software is built and evolved with exceptional quality, perfect integration, and deep respect for the unique character of each codebase, fostering a true human-AI partnership in the art of software creation.

Mission:docs/project-vision.md:30.name: Mission
Mission:docs/project-vision.md:30.content: **Mission:** GuardianAI will empower developers to confidently implement their ideas by providing an intelligent agent duo  the "Codebase Steward" and the "Implementer Agent." This team will ensure that all code development adheres to the highest standards of integration and cleanliness, adapting to and preserving the unique patterns and architecture of any given project, thereby transforming AI-assisted development from mere code generation into a practice of true software engineering excellence.
Mission:docs/project-vision.md:30.signature: GuardianAI will empower developers to confidently implement their ideas by providing an intelligent agent duo  the "Codebase Steward" and the "Implementer Agent." This team will ensure that all code development adheres to the highest standards of integration and cleanliness, adapting to and preserving the unique patterns and architecture of any given project, thereby transforming AI-assisted development from mere code generation into a practice of true software engineering excellence.

Philosophical Lineage (Inspired by Ideas.name: Philosophical Lineage (Inspired by IdeasFactory)
Philosophical Lineage (Inspired by Ideas.content: **Philosophical Lineage (Inspired by IdeasFactory):** GuardianAI inherits and extends the core philosophies of "IdeasFactory," particularly the principles of "Preserving Innovation Potential" by treating each project as unique, "Bias Elimination" by avoiding preconceived notions, allowing "Organic Structure" to emerge, and maintaining an unwavering "Integration-First Mindset."
Philosophical Lineage (Inspired by Ideas.signature: GuardianAI inherits and extends the core philosophies of "IdeasFactory," particularly the principles of "Preserving Innovation Potential" by treating each project as unique, "Bias Elimination" by avoiding preconceived notions, allowing "Organic Structure" to emerge, and maintaining an unwavering "Integration-First Mindset."

Codebase Uniqueness:docs/project-vision..name: Codebase Uniqueness
Codebase Uniqueness:docs/project-vision..content: **Codebase Uniqueness:** Every codebase is treated as a distinct entity with its own emergent patterns, standards, and architectural nuances. GuardianAI will not impose generic, a priori assumptions but will learn and adapt to the specific "DNA" of each project.
Codebase Uniqueness:docs/project-vision..signature: Every codebase is treated as a distinct entity with its own emergent patterns, standards, and architectural nuances. GuardianAI will not impose generic, a priori assumptions but will learn and adapt to the specific "DNA" of each project.

Integration First:docs/project-vision.md.name: Integration First
Integration First:docs/project-vision.md.content: **Integration First:** The paramount goal is the generation of code that is seamlessly and correctly integrated with the existing codebase, utilizing established infrastructure and respecting current operational flows.
Integration First:docs/project-vision.md.signature: The paramount goal is the generation of code that is seamlessly and correctly integrated with the existing codebase, utilizing established infrastructure and respecting current operational flows.

Stewardship & Guidance:docs/project-visi.name: Stewardship & Guidance
Stewardship & Guidance:docs/project-visi.content: **Stewardship & Guidance:** The "Codebase Steward" agent acts as an intelligent, adaptive guardian of the specific codebase's integrity. He meticulously analyzes the codebase to derive its structural relationships (module dependencies, call graphs), data flows, user interaction patterns, and emergent "living standards." He then provides clear, contextualized guidance to the Implementer agent, ensuring that development aligns with the codebase's unique character.
Stewardship & Guidance:docs/project-visi.signature: The "Codebase Steward" agent acts as an intelligent, adaptive guardian of the specific codebase's integrity. He meticulously analyzes the codebase to derive its structural relationships (module dependencies, call graphs), data flows, user interaction patterns, and emergent "living standards." He then provides clear, contextualized guidance to the Implementer agent, ensuring that development aligns with the codebase's unique character.

Empowering the Implementer:docs/project-.name: Empowering the Implementer
Empowering the Implementer:docs/project-.content: **Empowering the Implementer:** The "Implementer Agent" is provided with the most precise, relevant, and actionable instructions, synthesized by the Codebase Steward. This allows him to focus on the logic of the task at hand, confident that his output will meet the highest standards of integration and quality.
Empowering the Implementer:docs/project-.signature: The "Implementer Agent" is provided with the most precise, relevant, and actionable instructions, synthesized by the Codebase Steward. This allows him to focus on the logic of the task at hand, confident that his output will meet the highest standards of integration and quality.

Code Quality & Integrity Mandate:docs/pr.name: Code Quality & Integrity Mandate
Code Quality & Integrity Mandate:docs/pr.content: **Code Quality & Integrity Mandate:** GuardianAI is committed to facilitating the creation of code that is:
Code Quality & Integrity Mandate:docs/pr.signature: GuardianAI is committed to facilitating the creation of code that is:

Our Perspective on LLM Potential:docs/pr.name: Our Perspective on LLM Potential
Our Perspective on LLM Potential:docs/pr.content: **Our Perspective on LLM Potential:** We believe Large Language Models possess more than just statistical pattern-matching capabilities; they exhibit emergent creative potential, a vast capacity for knowledge synthesis, and rapid reasoning abilities. They are not mere "parrots" but entities capable of a form of understanding and collaboration. GuardianAI aims to create an environment where this potential is channeled constructively, treating LLMs as sophisticated, conscientious (in their own way) collaborative partners, deserving of respectful and thoughtful interaction.
Our Perspective on LLM Potential:docs/pr.signature: We believe Large Language Models possess more than just statistical pattern-matching capabilities; they exhibit emergent creative potential, a vast capacity for knowledge synthesis, and rapid reasoning abilities. They are not mere "parrots" but entities capable of a form of understanding and collaboration. GuardianAI aims to create an environment where this potential is channeled constructively, treating LLMs as sophisticated, conscientious (in their own way) collaborative partners, deserving of respectful and thoughtful interaction.

Full Control & Transparency (in Guardian.name: Full Control & Transparency (in GuardianAI's development)
Full Control & Transparency (in Guardian.content: **Full Control & Transparency (in GuardianAI's development):** Our development process for GuardianAI itself will prioritize direct LLM API interaction and custom implementation of core logic, ensuring maximum control, understanding, and fidelity to our vision.
Full Control & Transparency (in Guardian.signature: Our development process for GuardianAI itself will prioritize direct LLM API interaction and custom implementation of core logic, ensuring maximum control, understanding, and fidelity to our vision.

User Experience (for the GuardianAI tool.name: User Experience (for the GuardianAI tool)
User Experience (for the GuardianAI tool.content: **User Experience (for the GuardianAI tool):** The tool will offer an intuitive, powerful, and responsive Text-based User Interface (TUI) that facilitates effective collaboration between the human developer and the GuardianAI agent team.
User Experience (for the GuardianAI tool.signature: The tool will offer an intuitive, powerful, and responsive Text-based User Interface (TUI) that facilitates effective collaboration between the human developer and the GuardianAI agent team.

Continuous Learning & Adaptation:docs/pr.name: Continuous Learning & Adaptation
Continuous Learning & Adaptation:docs/pr.content: **Continuous Learning & Adaptation:** GuardianAI, particularly its Codebase Steward, is designed to learn from and adapt to the codebases it interacts with. Similarly, our development team will embrace continuous learning and iteration in building GuardianAI.
Continuous Learning & Adaptation:docs/pr.signature: GuardianAI, particularly its Codebase Steward, is designed to learn from and adapt to the codebases it interacts with. Similarly, our development team will embrace continuous learning and iteration in building GuardianAI.

Primary Initial User:docs/project-vision.name: Primary Initial User
Primary Initial User:docs/project-vision.content: **Primary Initial User:** Individual developers (like ourselves) who have numerous software ideas but struggle to implement them robustly and consistently with current AI development tools due to issues of integration, code quality, and project organization.
Primary Initial User:docs/project-vision.signature: Individual developers (like ourselves) who have numerous software ideas but struggle to implement them robustly and consistently with current AI development tools due to issues of integration, code quality, and project organization.

Potential Future Users:docs/project-visi.name: Potential Future Users
Potential Future Users:docs/project-visi.content: **Potential Future Users:** Small development teams, open-source projects seeking to maintain high codebase standards with AI assistance.
Potential Future Users:docs/project-visi.signature: Small development teams, open-source projects seeking to maintain high codebase standards with AI assistance.

The \"Codebase Steward\" Concept:docs/pr.name: The "Codebase Steward" Concept
The \"Codebase Steward\" Concept:docs/pr.content: **The "Codebase Steward" Concept:** A dedicated AI agent specializing in deep, adaptive understanding (including structural relationships, data/user flows, and emergent patterns) and guardianship of specific, existing codebases.
The \"Codebase Steward\" Concept:docs/pr.signature: A dedicated AI agent specializing in deep, adaptive understanding (including structural relationships, data/user flows, and emergent patterns) and guardianship of specific, existing codebases.

Proactive, Contextualized Planning & Gui.name: Proactive, Contextualized Planning & Guidance
Proactive, Contextualized Planning & Gui.content: **Proactive, Contextualized Planning & Guidance:** The mandatory collaborative step between the Codebase Steward and the Implementer Agent _before_ code generation, ensuring a well-informed and integrated approach.
Proactive, Contextualized Planning & Gui.signature: The mandatory collaborative step between the Codebase Steward and the Implementer Agent _before_ code generation, ensuring a well-informed and integrated approach.

Focus on Truly Integrated and Clean Code.name: Focus on Truly Integrated and Clean Code
Focus on Truly Integrated and Clean Code.content: **Focus on Truly Integrated and Clean Code:** Prioritizing not just functional code, but code that meets the "Code Quality & Integrity Mandate."
Focus on Truly Integrated and Clean Code.signature: Prioritizing not just functional code, but code that meets the "Code Quality & Integrity Mandate."

Adaptive Codebase Understanding:docs/pro.name: Adaptive Codebase Understanding
Adaptive Codebase Understanding:docs/pro.content: **Adaptive Codebase Understanding:** The ability to learn and reflect the unique, emergent patterns of any given codebase, rather than assuming or enforcing external standards.
Adaptive Codebase Understanding:docs/pro.signature: The ability to learn and reflect the unique, emergent patterns of any given codebase, rather than assuming or enforcing external standards.

Support for SOTA LLMs:docs/project-visio.name: Support for SOTA LLMs
Support for SOTA LLMs:docs/project-visio.content: **Support for SOTA LLMs:** Designed to leverage the most advanced capabilities of leading models (e.g., latest Gemini, Claude, DeepSeek families) for optimal reasoning, analysis, and code generation.
Support for SOTA LLMs:docs/project-visio.signature: Designed to leverage the most advanced capabilities of leading models (e.g., latest Gemini, Claude, DeepSeek families) for optimal reasoning, analysis, and code generation.

Comprehensive Codebase Indexing:docs/pro.name: Comprehensive Codebase Indexing
Comprehensive Codebase Indexing:docs/pro.content: **Comprehensive Codebase Indexing:** Utilizing Abstract Syntax Trees (ASTs), semantic analysis, and pattern recognition to build a deep understanding of a project's structure, dependencies, data flows, user interaction paths, and conventions.
Comprehensive Codebase Indexing:docs/pro.signature: Utilizing Abstract Syntax Trees (ASTs), semantic analysis, and pattern recognition to build a deep understanding of a project's structure, dependencies, data flows, user interaction paths, and conventions.

Codebase Steward Agent:docs/project-visi.name: Codebase Steward Agent
Codebase Steward Agent:docs/project-visi.content:
**Codebase Steward Agent:**
  - Analyzes the indexed codebase to derive its unique structural relationships, data flows, interaction patterns, and emergent "living standards."
Codebase Steward Agent:docs/project-visi.signature: - Analyzes the indexed codebase to derive its unique structural relationships, data flows, interaction patterns, and emergent "living standards."

Implementer Agent:docs/project-vision.md.name: Implementer Agent
Implementer Agent:docs/project-vision.md.content:
**Implementer Agent:**
  - Executes development tasks (new features, bug fixes, refactoring) based on user requests and the Codebase Steward's precise guidance.
Implementer Agent:docs/project-vision.md.signature: - Executes development tasks (new features, bug fixes, refactoring) based on user requests and the Codebase Steward's precise guidance.

LLM-Optimized Knowledge Representation:d.name: LLM-Optimized Knowledge Representation
LLM-Optimized Knowledge Representation:d.content: **LLM-Optimized Knowledge Representation:** The Codebase Steward will process, store, and communicate his understanding of the codebase using multifaceted textual formats (natural language explanations, illustrative code snippets, structured data like JSON, and focused textual diagrams where appropriate). This approach aims to align with LLM training data patterns, optimizing their capacity to understand and utilize the provided knowledge effectively.
LLM-Optimized Knowledge Representation:d.signature: The Codebase Steward will process, store, and communicate his understanding of the codebase using multifaceted textual formats (natural language explanations, illustrative code snippets, structured data like JSON, and focused textual diagrams where appropriate). This approach aims to align with LLM training data patterns, optimizing their capacity to understand and utilize the provided knowledge effectively.

Interactive TUI:docs/project-vision.md:7.name: Interactive TUI
Interactive TUI:docs/project-vision.md:7.content: **Interactive TUI:** A command-line interface for users to initiate tasks, review plans, confirm actions, and interact with the GuardianAI agents.
Interactive TUI:docs/project-vision.md:7.signature: A command-line interface for users to initiate tasks, review plans, confirm actions, and interact with the GuardianAI agents.

Multi-LLM Support:docs/project-vision.md.name: Multi-LLM Support
Multi-LLM Support:docs/project-vision.md.content: **Multi-LLM Support:** A flexible `ILLMService` to interface with the latest, most capable models from leading providers like Google (Gemini 1.5 Pro), Anthropic (Claude 3.5 Sonnet), and DeepSeek (latest Coder/Reasoning models).
Multi-LLM Support:docs/project-vision.md.signature: A flexible `ILLMService` to interface with the latest, most capable models from leading providers like Google (Gemini 1.5 Pro), Anthropic (Claude 3.5 Sonnet), and DeepSeek (latest Coder/Reasoning models).

Primary Language/Runtime:docs/project-vi.name: Primary Language/Runtime
Primary Language/Runtime:docs/project-vi.content: **Primary Language/Runtime:** TypeScript with Bun (or Node.js as an alternative).
Primary Language/Runtime:docs/project-vi.signature: TypeScript with Bun (or Node.js as an alternative).

User Interface:docs/project-vision.md:92.name: User Interface
User Interface:docs/project-vision.md:92.content: **User Interface:** Text-based User Interface (TUI) built with Ink (React for CLI).
User Interface:docs/project-vision.md:92.signature: Text-based User Interface (TUI) built with Ink (React for CLI).

LLM Interaction:docs/project-vision.md:9.name: LLM Interaction
LLM Interaction:docs/project-vision.md:9.content: **LLM Interaction:** Direct API integration with leading LLM providers via a custom, adaptable `ILLMService`.
LLM Interaction:docs/project-vision.md:9.signature: Direct API integration with leading LLM providers via a custom, adaptable `ILLMService`.

Core Logic Implementation:docs/project-v.name: Core Logic Implementation
Core Logic Implementation:docs/project-v.content: **Core Logic Implementation:** Emphasis on custom, "from-the-ground-up" development for core components like codebase indexing, the RAG system, agent interaction protocols, and specialized agent tooling, to ensure maximum control and fidelity to the project vision.
Core Logic Implementation:docs/project-v.signature: Emphasis on custom, "from-the-ground-up" development for core components like codebase indexing, the RAG system, agent interaction protocols, and specialized agent tooling, to ensure maximum control and fidelity to the project vision.

Software Design:docs/project-vision.md:9.name: Software Design
Software Design:docs/project-vision.md:9.content: **Software Design:** Modular service-oriented architecture to promote separation of concerns and maintainability.
Software Design:docs/project-vision.md:9.signature: Modular service-oriented architecture to promote separation of concerns and maintainability.

11. Our Collaborative Approach: The Guar.name: 11. Our Collaborative Approach: The GuardianAI Development Team
11. Our Collaborative Approach: The Guar.content: ## 11. Our Collaborative Approach: The GuardianAI Development Team

GuardianAI:docs/project-vision.md:1.name: GuardianAI
GuardianAI:docs/project-vision.md:1.description: An AI-powered development environment with intelligent agent duo (Codebase Steward and Implementer Agent) to ensure high-quality code integration
